name: makeup-screenreader-trap
description: Restricts screen reader virtual cursor to a single subtree in the DOM
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.compile: npm run compile:mjs && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.compile:cjs: babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs src/index.js --out-file dist/cjs/index.js && babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs src/util.js --out-file dist/cjs/util.js
